participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and outgoing, loves to explore the outdoors and take on new challenges.
participant_1.background: i like to go hiking in the spring. i live in colorado. i have a black lab named trooper. i'm a mechanical engineer. my favorite activity is rock climbing.

participant_2.name: Lucas
participant_2.personality: Reliable and family-oriented, values stability and enjoys spending time with his children and pets.
participant_2.background: i own a house in florida. i work in it and have been at the same company for 15 years. i have a children and a dogs. i'm a male.
